code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from"axios";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import GoToButton from'../components/GoToButton';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Books(){const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await axios.delete("http://localhost:8800/books/"+id);console.log("book deleted");window.location.reload();}catch(err){console.log(err);}};useEffect(()=>{const fetchAllBooks=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:8800/books");setBooks(res.data);console.log(res);}catch(err){console.log(err);}};fetchAllBooks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your library"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"books",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book",children:[book.cover&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.cover,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.desc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:book.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>handleDelete(book.id),children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GoToButton,{className:"goto-button",link:`./update/${book.id}`,children:"Update"})]}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GoToButton,{className:"goto-button add-button",link:"./add",children:"Add New Book"})]});}
